Title: North Dallas Forty
Writer: Peter Gent (novel), Frank Yablans (screenplay), Ted Kotcheff (screenplay), Peter Gent (screenplay)
Actors: Nick Nolte, Mac Davis, Charles Durning, Dayle Haddon
Plot: A satire of American professional football in which a veteran pass-catcher's individuality and refusal to become part of the team family is bitterly resented by his disciplinarian coaches.
